version_name: 1.4.0• News Stream – view what your fellow Homestylers have been up to

version_description:
• Visual enhancements and better usability when getting started with the app
• A wide range of user requested bug fixes
Bug fixes.
• A wide range of user requested bug fixes

•User requested bug fixes
•Multi-Word Catalog Search! Enjoy improved search capabilities when looking for your favorite catalog products either by color, brand or other details
•This new release fixes a bunch of old bugs, and is more stable than ever…. Enjoy!

Yes, We are Back. Now Homestyler joins Easyhome family.
As a product team, we feel very fortunate to have found this chance and still be able to remain focused on our users, strengthen and build on our offerings to deliver great value.
The service had been restored, currently the comment and like in the design stream are not available, but we are working hard to get the new update live as soon as possible.
The new adventure of Homestyler just begun, please stay tuned, and share this widely with your peers.
Of course, should you have any questions or concerns, shoot us an email at support@homestyler.com.
Urgent Bug Fix

1. The comment and like features are available in our design community.
2. Several major bugs were fixed.
3. Optimized for iOS 11.

1. You can view other users' profiles in community now.
2. Bug fixes and performance improvements.

1. You could return to the same menu where you were at when searching.
2. We fixed a list of major bugs.

1. Homestyler is ARKit-powered and compatible with iPhone 6S and newer devices on iOS 11.
2. Bug fixes and performance improvements.

• Bug fixes and performance improvements.

We are working on the next generation of Homestyler to bring you a whole new experience of interior design and community, please stay tuned.

Homestyler 3.0 is coming! The version includes：
-Big visual enhancement to enrich your community experience.
-Our "Follow" feature is back.You will now be able to connect with the other Homestylers and receive their updates.
-You will now be notified when you get comments, likes and when you get featured.
-You will see the latest designs in the community.
-You will now see who likes your designs. Say "Hi" to these lovely people :-)

1. Search your friends through their username and homestyler ID
2. Visual enhancement and bug fix
1. Bug fixes and performance improvements.

You can delete both your comments and the ones other people write under your designs.
Invite your friends.
You can be elected as a Weekstyler to get new exposure every week.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance enhancements.

1. You can add #tag to your design, and check others' designs with the same #tag. Easier to check entries of the design competition!
2. New empty rooms and models.
3. Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

1.You will be notified when the featured stream is updated.
2.Bug fixes and performance enhancement.

1. You can choose to receive important notifications when you are not using the app. Be the first one to know when you get featured and win the contests!
2. Performance enhancement and bug fixed.

1. Optimized the interaction of copying and deleting items.
2. New redesign feature in order to prevent plagiarism.
3. Join our new survey to help Homestyler get better.
4. You can copy and paste the text in the community.
5. Performance optimization and bug fixes.
